verses.roman:
ālālanāthe āsi' kṛṣṇadāse pāṭhāila
nityānanda-ādi nija-gaṇe bolāila

synonyms: ālālanāthe—to the place known as Ālālanātha; āsi'-coming; kṛṣṇadāse—Kṛṣṇadāsa, His assistant; pāṭhāila—sent ahead; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; ādi—and others; nija-gaṇe—personal associates; bolāila—called for.
translation: When the Lord reached Ālālanātha, He sent His assistant Kṛṣṇadāsa ahead to call for Nityānanda and other personal associates.
